 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁךְ‎</span> **verb** ==bite== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew, but also transposed <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְכַשׁ‎</span> Hiph\`il); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***našâku***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 486</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְכֵית‎</span> (especially of snakes); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>642</sup>; [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xliii (1889), 188</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***undo*** threads, ***untwist*** rope, ***disintegrate, dissolve***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁךְ‎</span> [[Num.21.9|Num 21:9]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְשָׁכוֺ‎</span> consecutive [[Amos.5.19|Amos 5:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְשָׁכָם‎</span> consecutive [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשֹּׁךְ‎</span> [[Eccl.10.11|Eccl 10:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁ֑ךְ‎</span> [[Prov.23.32|Prov 23:32]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְּׁכֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Eccl.10.8|Eccl 10:8]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשֵׁךְ‎</span> [[Gen.49.17|Gen 49:17]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁכִים‎</span> [[Mic.3.5|Mic 3:5]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁכֶיךָ‎</span> [[Hab.2.7|Hab 2:7]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשׁוּךְ‎</span> [[Num.21.8|Num 21:8]] — ***bite***, chiefly of serpent, with accusative, [[Amos.5.19|Amos 5:19]]; [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]]; [[Gen.49.17|Gen 49:17]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.21.8|Num 21:8]] (passive participle, absolute), v[[Num.21.9|Num 21:9]], [[Eccl.10.8|Eccl 10:8]] also v[[Eccl.10.11|Eccl 10:11]] (absolute), [[Prov.23.32|Prov 23:32]] (simile of wine); figurative of prophets <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשִׁנֵּיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנּ‎</span> [[Mic.3.5|Mic 3:5]] ***who are biting with their teeth***, and crying, Peace! figurative of oppression, etc., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁכֶיךָ‎</span> [[Hab.2.7|Hab 2:7]] (with play on sense ***thy debtors, those that give thee interest***). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִשְּׁכוּ אֶתְכֶם‎</span> [[Jer.8.17|Jer 8:17]] ***and they shall bite you fatally*** (figurative); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַשְּׁכוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהָֿעָם‎</span> [[Num.21.5|Num 21:5]] ***and they bit the people fatally(both of serpents). ***



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁךְ‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==pay, give interest== (compare [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>Verba denominative 89</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁ֑ךְ‎</span> [[Deut.23.20|Deut 23:20]] interest of anything off which ***one giveth interest*** (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). **Hiph\`il** ***make*** one ***give interest; Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשִּׁיךְ‎</span> [[Deut.23.20|Deut 23:20]] ( + accusative of congnate meaning with verb) v.[[Deut.23.21|Deut 23:21]] v.[[Deut.23.21|Deut 23:21]], all with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person
